verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Megha mandala mantuchunnadi naaku daahambadi theerchu chunnadi vegame manujulanu maarchiveyunu maarchi veyunadiye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vidudalanu ichunadiye vidipinchu ghora paapamunundi kadu shramalanadi sweekarinchunu Sweekarinchu nadiye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prudhivi nellayu maaripoyinan satya mennadu maarane maaradu nityamaina Yesu satyamaaye nilalo satyamaaye nilalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Khadgambu boli koyunadiye padagottunu dustula nadiye vadi vadigaa thana pani neraverchu nadiye neraverchunadiye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Udakambu boli kadugu nadiye addamu boli choopu nadiye adi bangaaru viluva galadi viluva galadiye{/lang-eng}
